name: Capricious Visage
description:
When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses an Elemental Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less Elemental Die. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext:
Even a faint smile could not conceal her sorrow.
Though this is a festive day, it seems more like a farewell...
